h2_title: Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide
content: The Martialist will often end this phase by trying to ambush you out of nowhere, slicing both weapons to create a half-ring of fire in front of him. Dodge around to the side of the fire he creates so you can flank him without getting burned.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Green-Capped_Martialist.md', within the main section titled 'Green-Capped Martialist', specifically from the subsection 'Green-Capped Martialist Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
The Martialist will often end this phase by trying to ambush you out of nowhere, slicing both weapons to create a half-ring of fire in front of him. Dodge around to the side of the fire he creates so you can flank him without getting burned.
